message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $125. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice! However, $125 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you consider that?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I'm thinking of a price of $115. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice! However, $115 is still a bit above my target. I'm thinking of a price of $105. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to your target, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I'm thinking of a price of $112. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my limit, Alice! I'm thinking of a price of $108. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob! I'm thinking of a price of $110. What do you think?
I'm not willing to go any higher, Alice. I'm thinking of a price of $105. This is my final offer. Can you meet me at that price?
